alert.note: Alert for Northern Panhandle (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 4:06AM MST until January 20 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Wet snow. Snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches in the lowlands and 3 to 6 inches for the mountains. * WHERE...Eastport, Chewelah, Colville, Northport, Flowery Trail Road, Orin-Rice Road, Newport, Springdale-Hunters Road, Kettle Falls, Schweitzer Mountain Road, and Priest River. * WHEN...Until Noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Expect winter driving conditions this morning before temperatures climb into the mid to upper 30s this afternoon.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
